page.title: 04Airships at Cardington
page.content:
We went to see{Airship Industries in the hangars at Cardington. Our teacher is tall but these hangars were 100x him. We went inside the hangars which are 784 feet long.
Our guide took us to look at a Skyship 600. This means it has 6000 cu.m of helium. Beyond it another similar ship was also being built. The guide showed us around and told us about them.
The balloon has a double skin to keep the helium inside because the gas is always trying to escape. There were 30-40 weights holding it down, as otherwise it would float to the top of the hangar. The gondola underneath could carry 18 passengers and two crew to fly it.
